title: The Focus Tree
subtitle: How Flutter organizes all focusable widgets.

leftBullets.title: A Parent-Child Hierarchy
leftBullets.description: Flutter organizes all focusable widgets into a tree structure, much like the widget tree itself.

leftBullets.title: `FocusNode`s are Leaves
leftBullets.description: Individual focusable widgets are the leaves of this tree.

leftBullets.title: `FocusScopeNode`s are Branches
leftBullets.description: Scopes act as containers or branches, grouping related nodes together.

leftBullets.title: Defines Traversal
leftBullets.description: This tree structure is what Flutter uses to determine the default navigation order.
